mapper.select: select id, date, ip, login_name, tty, create_at, update_at from ip_original_fail_data where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ip_original_fail_data(date, ip, login_name, tty, create_at, update_at) values (#{date}, #{ip}, #{loginName}, #{tty}, #{createAt}, #{updateAt})

insert into ip_original_fail_data(date, ip, login_name, tty, create_at, update_at) values
(#{entity.date}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.loginName}, #{entity.tty}, #{entity.createAt}, #{entity.updateAt})

insert into ip_original_fail_data(date, ip, login_name, tty, create_at, update_at) values
(#{entity.date}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.loginName}, #{entity.tty}, #{entity.createAt}, #{entity.updateAt})
on duplicate key update date = values(date), ip = values(ip), login_name = values(login_name), tty = values(tty), create_at = values(create_at), update_at = values(update_at)
